archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Allocate Resource
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: This process allocates specific resources in response to issued resource orders. Where the Allocate & Install Resource processes are requested by a resource order issued in response to a confirmed customer order, this process is responsible for allocating the specific resources required to satisfy the initiating resource order. Any previously reserved specific resources are marked as allocated.

properties.value: Not used for this process element
